title: Poser ~ DAZ3D : Movie Sets, City Block Fifteen [RO 100141]
description:
The line continues with City Block Fifteen

~~~FIGURES~~~
 Outer Blocks with Hide Show Poses for the two sizes of Grass Sections

~~~PROPS~~~
 1 City Block Fifteen with the proper limits set, for perfect alignment
12 Separate Homes that may be saved as their own Props, each include 1 or 2 TV Antennas that may rotate 
 1 Gas Station with fenced in lot and Tall Spinning Sign with Neon Lights
16 Single Polygon Trees that may be sized and moved as you see fit includes Single Weeds. Duplicate for more Trees
 1 Single Polygon Trees Grouped the same as when you load the whole city block all 16 of them in case you want to put all the Trees back the way they were when loading City Block Fifteen.
 1 Fire Hydrant
 1 Street Lamp
 1 Basketball
 1 Basketball Backboard on a pole that can be located anywhere
 1 Park Bench
 1 Stone Bench
 Weeds all over the place may be hidden if you like
 1 Single Flat Weed Clone for more of them
 1 Single Round Weed Clone for more of them 
 Many, Many built in details.
 1 set of Road Signs
 1 Power Pole and Power Line System
 Lots of these items may be saved as separate props for other scenes.

~~~MATERIALS~~~
 5 Block Fifteen all but the Flower Zones .mc6 Dry, Puddles Large, Puddles Small, Raining large, Raining Small
 5 Blocks Outer .mc6 Dry, Puddles Large, Puddles Small, Raining large, Raining Small
 6 Grass Singles .mc5 Dry Abandoned, Dry Long, Dry medium, Dry Mover is Broken, Dry Short, Puddles
 2 Defaults Block Fifteen and Blocks Outer
 12 Home Default Materials to put them back to factory settings .mc6
 1 Gas Station Default Materials to put them back to factory settings .mc6
28 Plant Singles that may be applied to any plant object. Bushes and Trees .mc5
20 Flower Bed Materials that may be applied to any of the 60 different Flower Zones .mc5

393 Material Maps includes some bump, displacement, reflection and Alpha maps

~~~LIGHTS and CAMERAS~~~
20 Simple Cameras
20 Matching Lights

~~~DETAILS~~~
This Quad Modeling totals 62,492 Polygons including the Outer Blocks
The Sky Dome is not included.
All promotional images, completed in Poser
Objects not included in this description are not included.
Not tested in Daz Studio or any other program
May not be used in Second Life for any purpose.
All content by Dreamland Models.
-----
 
https://pximg.xyz/images/722b73a30ed3547529a03cb3e2be7896.jpg

Renderosity 100141 - Movie Sets, City Block Fifteen

Note: Made for Poser. In D|S none of the material settings does a damn thing, but it all loads okay
